entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character of the story, introduced as he enters the classroom late.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts, mentioned as being cold and strict.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is one of the four houses at Hogwarts, mentioned as losing points due to Harry's tardiness.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a friend of Harry's, sitting beside him in class.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are creatures that are mentioned as being the subject of an essay assignment.

entities.name: inferius
entities.description: Inferius is a creature mentioned in conversation between Snape and Seamus Finnigan.

entities.name: seamus finnigan
entities.description: Seamus Finnigan is a student who asks a question about Inferius.

entities.name: imperius curse
entities.description: The Imperius Curse is mentioned as the subject of an essay assignment.

relationships.description: Harry's tardiness results in Gryffindor losing points.
Snape assigns an essay on Dementors.
